metadata.synopsis: The party comments on the gruesome smell and/or appearance of the Colony's kitchen and dissection room.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Entering the kitchen and dissection room in the Mind Flayer Colony.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: The stench. I wonder how many pilgrimages to Moonrise ended down here.
0.context: NodeContext: Entering a room that smells disgusting
